verbose_text: Intriguingly, constitutive activation of Notch signalling via expression of the Notch3 intracellular domain seems to promote the proliferation, but not the specification, of brain pericytes in zebrafish, suggesting that the activation of distinct Notch signalling pathways may have different outcomes during the development of perivascular cells.
evidence: Notch signalling via expression of the Notch3 intracellular domain seems to promote the proliferation
